name: Senior Digital Developer
lead_in: A veteran who has produced web services and clients for over 13 years, resulting in a breadth and depth of technical knowledge which is second to none. A confident, proactive approach to problem solving naturally results in taking a leading role in getting products delivered. The combination of the two makes a senior developer who is a strong asset to any team.
